patch_unified:
diff --git a/bin/elasticsearch b/bin/elasticsearch
index 753aa8e..ba1322c 100755
--- a/bin/elasticsearch
+++ b/bin/elasticsearch
@@ -3,6 +3,9 @@
 # OPTIONS:
 #   -d: daemonize, start in the background
 #   -p <filename>: log the pid to a file (useful to kill it later)
+#   -D<property>=<value>: set a Java system property value
+#   -X<option>: set a non-standard Java option
+#   --<es.property>=<value>: set an Elasticsearch property (converted to -Des.<property>=<value>)
 
 # CONTROLLING STARTUP:
 #
@@ -150,8 +153,27 @@ launch_service()
     fi
 }
 
+# Parse any long-style command line options (--key=value) and convert them to -D format
+parsed_args=""
+for arg in "$@"; do
+    case $arg in
+        --*=*)
+            # Extract key and value from --key=value
+            key_value="${arg#--}"
+            key="${key_value%%=*}"
+            value="${key_value#*=}"
+            # Add as -D property with es. prefix
+            parsed_args="$parsed_args -Des.$key=$value"
+            ;;
+        *)
+            # Keep other arguments as-is
+            parsed_args="$parsed_args $arg"
+            ;;
+    esac
+done
+
 # Parse any command line options.
-args=`getopt vdhp:D:X: "$@"`
+args=`getopt vdhp:D:X: $parsed_args`
 eval set -- "$args"
 
 while true; do
@@ -170,7 +192,14 @@ while true; do
             shift
         ;;
         -h)
-            echo "Usage: $0 [-d] [-h] [-p pidfile]"
+            echo "Usage: $0 [-d] [-h] [-p pidfile] [-D<property>=<value>] [-X<option>] [--<es.property>=<value>]"
+            echo ""
+            echo "  -d                       Start in daemon mode (background)"
+            echo "  -h                       Show this help message"
+            echo "  -p <pidfile>             Write process ID to specified file"
+            echo "  -D<property>=<value>     Set a Java system property"
+            echo "  -X<option>               Set a non-standard Java option"
+            echo "  --<es.property>=<value>  Set an Elasticsearch property (e.g., --node.name=my-node)"
             exit 0
         ;;
         -D)
